questions.text: Because the Zero Carbon Act is an essential prescription for New Zealand’s health and wellbeing, I call for a Zero Carbon Act that’s fast, fair, firm and founded on Te Tiriti with health at its heart.

questions.title: In my own words:
questions.description: Please use your own experience and expertise to add anything else here about why this Bill is important:

questions.title: As a
questions.description: Add your role(s) here if you like. If not, then this will be ommitted.

questions.text:
I want:
  • the Zero Carbon Act to grow great health co-benefits and health equity in Aotearoa-NZ
  • the Climate Change Commission to include Commissioners and staff who understand climate change health impacts and opportunities now, and in future, from well-designed healthy climate action

I want to work with health colleagues to:
  • help our health sector quickly reach net zero emissions

and I expect:
  • savings from reduced health sector emissions devoted to better health-care.
